name: GhostEscape (CreativeMouse)
description:
A ghost to catch you and is chasing you, but do not fear, You, and your majestic abilities to use your mouse is amazingly useful.

AND BEWARE OF THE LAST LEVEL, YOU WILL HATE IT.

Object that are worth note of:

Jump-pad: You can't jump, so this helps.

Teleport-door: It lets you teleport one time in the level.

Push block: You can push it. buggy but works.

SPIKES: spikes.

Grass/Ground block: you can walk on it freely.

Ghost: The one chasing you.

Character: YOU.

Credits (music): Thanks to Shiru

8-bit Chiptune - A Little Journey | OpenGameArt.org 

8-bit Chiptune - Time Up | OpenGameArt.org 

My Music:

Sadness of Ending(Endscreen song)

Promising Piano(Start Screen)
